And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> when<S>3753</S> the Lamb<S>721</S> opened<S>455</S> one<S>3391</S> of<S>1537</S> the seals<S>4973</S>, and<S>2532</S> I heard<S>191</S>, as it were<S>5613</S> the noise<S>5456</S> of thunder<S>1027</S>, one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> the four<S>5064</S> beasts<S>2226</S> saying<S>3004</S>, Come<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> see<S>991</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S> behold<S>2400</S> a white<S>3022</S> horse<S>2462</S>: and<S>2532</S> he that sat<S>2521</S> on<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S> had<S>2192</S> a bow<S>5115</S>; and<S>2532</S> a crown<S>4735</S> was given<S>1325</S> unto him<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> he went forth<S>1831</S> conquering<S>3528</S>, and<S>2532</S> to<S>2443</S> conquer<S>3528</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> he had opened<S>455</S> the second<S>1208</S> seal<S>4973</S>, I heard<S>191</S> the second<S>1208</S> beast<S>2226</S> say<S>3004</S>, Come<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> see<S>991</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there went out<S>1831</S> another<S>243</S> horse<S>2462</S> that was red<S>4450</S>: and<S>2532</S> power was given<S>1325</S> to him<S>846</S> that sat<S>2521</S> thereon<S>1909</S> <S>846</S> to take<S>2983</S> peace<S>1515</S> from<S>575</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> that<S>2443</S> they should kill<S>4969</S> one another<S>240</S>: and<S>2532</S> there was given<S>1325</S> unto him<S>846</S> a great<S>3173</S> sword<S>3162</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> he had opened<S>455</S> the third<S>5154</S> seal<S>4973</S>, I heard<S>191</S> the third<S>5154</S> beast<S>2226</S> say<S>3004</S>, Come<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> see<S>991</S>. And<S>2532</S> I beheld<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S> lo<S>2400</S> a black<S>3189</S> horse<S>2462</S>; and<S>2532</S> he that sat<S>2521</S> on<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S> had<S>2192</S> a pair of balances<S>2218</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> hand<S>5495</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I heard<S>191</S> a voice<S>5456</S> in<S>1722</S> the midst<S>3319</S> of the four<S>5064</S> beasts<S>2226</S> say<S>3004</S>, A measure<S>5518</S> of wheat<S>4621</S> for a penny<S>1220</S>, and<S>2532</S> three<S>5140</S> measures<S>5518</S> of barley<S>2915</S> for a penny<S>1220</S>; and<S>2532</S> see thou hurt<S>91</S> not<S>3361</S> the oil<S>1637</S> and<S>2532</S> the wine<S>3631</S>. <sup>A measure: the word choenix signifieth a measure containing one wine quart, and the twelfth part of a quart</sup>
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> he had opened<S>455</S> the fourth<S>5067</S> seal<S>4973</S>, I heard<S>191</S> the voice<S>5456</S> of the fourth<S>5067</S> beast<S>2226</S> say<S>3004</S>, Come<S>2064</S> and<S>2532</S> see<S>991</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I looked<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S> behold<S>2400</S> a pale<S>5515</S> horse<S>2462</S>: and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> that sat<S>2521</S> on<S>1883</S> him<S>846</S> was Death<S>2288</S>, and<S>2532</S> Hell<S>86</S> followed<S>190</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>. And<S>2532</S> power<S>1849</S> was given<S>1325</S> unto them<S>846</S> over<S>1909</S> the fourth part<S>5067</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>, to kill<S>615</S> with<S>1722</S> sword<S>4501</S>, and<S>2532</S> with<S>1722</S> hunger<S>3042</S>, and<S>2532</S> with<S>1722</S> death<S>2288</S>, and<S>2532</S> with<S>5259</S> the beasts<S>2342</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>. <sup>unto them: or, to him</sup>
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> he had opened<S>455</S> the fifth<S>3991</S> seal<S>4973</S>, I saw<S>1492</S> under<S>5270</S> the altar<S>2379</S> the souls<S>5590</S> of them that were slain<S>4969</S> for<S>1223</S> the word<S>3056</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> for<S>1223</S> the testimony<S>3141</S> which<S>3739</S> they held<S>2192</S>:
And<S>2532</S> they cried<S>2896</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, How<S>2193</S> long<S>4219</S>, O Lord<S>1203</S>, holy<S>40</S> and<S>2532</S> true<S>228</S>, dost thou<S>2919</S> not<S>3756</S> judge<S>2919</S> and<S>2532</S> avenge<S>1556</S> our<S>2257</S> blood<S>129</S> on<S>575</S> them that dwell<S>2730</S> on<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S>?
And<S>2532</S> white<S>3022</S> robes<S>4749</S> were given<S>1325</S> unto every one of them<S>1538</S>; and<S>2532</S> it was said<S>4483</S> unto them<S>846</S>, that<S>2443</S> they should rest<S>373</S> yet<S>2089</S> for a little<S>3398</S> season<S>5550</S>, until<S>2193</S> their<S>846</S> fellowservants<S>4889</S> also<S>2532</S> and<S>2532</S> their<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S>, that should<S>3195</S> be killed<S>615</S> as<S>5613</S> <S>2532</S> they<S>846</S> were, should<S>3739</S> be fulfilled<S>4137</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I beheld<S>1492</S> when<S>3753</S> he had opened<S>455</S> the sixth<S>1623</S> seal<S>4973</S>, and<S>2532</S>, lo<S>2400</S>, there was<S>1096</S> a great<S>3173</S> earthquake<S>4578</S>; and<S>2532</S> the sun<S>2246</S> became<S>1096</S> black<S>3189</S> as<S>5613</S> sackcloth<S>4526</S> of hair<S>5155</S>, and<S>2532</S> the moon<S>4582</S> became<S>1096</S> as<S>5613</S> blood<S>129</S>;
And<S>2532</S> the stars<S>792</S> of heaven<S>3772</S> fell<S>4098</S> unto<S>1519</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, even as<S>5613</S> a fig tree<S>4808</S> casteth<S>906</S> her<S>846</S> untimely figs<S>3653</S>, when she is shaken<S>4579</S> of<S>5259</S> a mighty<S>3173</S> wind<S>417</S>. <sup>untimely figs: or, green figs</sup>
And<S>2532</S> the heaven<S>3772</S> departed<S>673</S> as<S>5613</S> a scroll<S>975</S> when it is rolled together<S>1507</S>; and<S>2532</S> every<S>3956</S> mountain<S>3735</S> and<S>2532</S> island<S>3520</S> were moved<S>2795</S> out of<S>1537</S> their<S>846</S> places<S>5117</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the kings<S>935</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>, and<S>2532</S> the great men<S>3175</S>, and<S>2532</S> the rich men<S>4145</S>, and<S>2532</S> the chief captains<S>5506</S>, and<S>2532</S> the mighty men<S>1415</S>, and<S>2532</S> every<S>3956</S> bondman<S>1401</S>, and<S>2532</S> every<S>3956</S> free man<S>1658</S>, hid<S>2928</S> themselves<S>1438</S> in<S>1519</S> the dens<S>4693</S> and<S>2532</S> in<S>1519</S> the rocks<S>4073</S> of the mountains<S>3735</S>;
And<S>2532</S> said<S>3004</S> to the mountains<S>3735</S> and<S>2532</S> rocks<S>4073</S>, Fall<S>4098</S> on<S>1909</S> us<S>2248</S>, and<S>2532</S> hide<S>2928</S> us<S>2248</S> from<S>575</S> the face<S>4383</S> of him that sitteth<S>2521</S> on<S>1909</S> the throne<S>2362</S>, and<S>2532</S> from<S>575</S> the wrath<S>3709</S> of the Lamb<S>721</S>:
For<S>3754</S> the great<S>3173</S> day<S>2250</S> of his<S>846</S> wrath<S>3709</S> is come<S>2064</S>; and<S>2532</S> who<S>5101</S> shall be able<S>1410</S> to stand<S>2476</S>?
